channel.title: Git-Fsck on Today I Learned
channel.description: Recent content in Git-Fsck on Today I Learned

item.description: This was a bit of a rollercoaster morning: (1) I tried git worktree add $branch, and it was pretty convenient! (2) until I got a pre-commit error, then I got error: unable to read $HASH on git status (3) which led me to discover git fsck --full --name-objects, which is currently yelling about error: $HASH: invalid sha1 pointer in cache-tree
